price: Hao wanawake kama mayai yaliyo hifadhika.
footnotes: Hao wanawake wenye macho ya staha ni kama mayai ya mbuni, yaliyo hifadhiwa na mbawa zake. Basi hayaguswi na mikono, wala hayapati vumbi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
